@graph.name: Vegan Deep Dish Pizza Recipe
@graph.description: Vegan Deep Dish Pizza Recipe. Easy Deep Dish Pizza with from scratch Crust, red pepper, spinach, vegan mozzarella and basil. Vegan Pizza Recipe with Almost No Knead 20 minute Crust.. Makes 1 tall 8 ot 9 inch tall cake pan, preferably Springform pan.

video.name: VEGAN DEEP DISH PIZZA WITH 20 MINUTE CRUST | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Deep Dish Pizza with from scratch Crust, red pepper, spinach, Vegan mozzarella and basil. From scratch Vegan Mozzarella Slices also in the book!
ðŸ’™ FULL RECIPE IN MY BOOK: https://veganricha.com/vrekaz
ðŸ’™ Blog Deep Dish Recipe: https://www.veganricha.com/2016/09/vegan-deep-dish-pizza-recipe.html

This super easy Deep dish Pizza is saucy, filled with simple ingredients. It comes together quickly and makes for a filling meal. You can fill the pizza with any veggies you like, saute'ed mushrooms, sliced veggies, some spiced tempeh crumbles etc. 

Layer vegan mozzarella (vegan mozzarella slices also in the book for a cheesier deep dish), pizza sauce, bell pepper spinach mixture, more sauce, other veggies, olives or crumbles if using, vegan mozzarella and basil. Make a tall Vegan Deep Dish Pizza!
More Vegan Pizza Recipes: https://www.veganricha.com/category/pizza

https://www.youtube.com/user/JoakimKarud

recipeIngredient: 1  red bell pepper (thinly sliced or use roasted bell pepper)
4 to 5 oz Spinach (baby spinach or chopped)
1.5 to 2 cups flour (I use unbleached white)
1/4 cup semolina flour (or use fine cornmeal)
Vegan Mozzarella shreds (homemade or vegan brands )
or use Vegan Mozzarella Slices from my Book
about 14 oz Pizza sauce ((store bought or homemade, see recipe in Everyday Kitchen book))

recipeInstructions.name: Make the red bell pepper spinach mixture:

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. Add red bell pepper and cook for 3 to 4 minutes. Add in spinach, basil, thyme, salt, red pepper flakes and salt and mix in. Cook until spinach is wilted
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. Add red bell pepper and cook for 3 to 4 minutes. Add in spinach, basil, thyme, salt, red pepper flakes and salt and mix in. Cook until spinach is wilted

itemListElement.text: Mix warm water, yeast and sugar and let sit for a few minutes. Add 1.5 cups flour, salt, semolina flour and oil and mix well with a spoon. You can also add some garlic powder or dried herbs at this point. Add a tbsp or so more flour if needed and mix in. Gather the dough and knead for a few seconds to make a soft dough. Let the dough sit in a warm place for 15 minutes. See <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yZl0SESiIIk" target="_blank">this video</a> for mixing and shaping the dough.
itemListElement.name: Mix warm water, yeast and sugar and let sit for a few minutes. Add 1.5 cups flour, salt, semolina flour and oil and mix well with a spoon. You can also add some garlic powder or dried herbs at this point. Add a tbsp or so more flour if needed and mix in. Gather the dough and knead for a few seconds to make a soft dough. Let the dough sit in a warm place for 15 minutes. See <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yZl0SESiIIk" target="_blank">this video</a> for mixing and shaping the dough.

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 435 degrees F(225 deg C).
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 435 degrees F(225 deg C).

itemListElement.text: Spray oil on he dough, then take it out and make a somewhat smooth ball. Using some flour spread the dough on 8 or 9 inch pan with tall sides making sure to spread some of the dough above the edge. Keep the bottom thick enough else it might not support the heavy toppings. *
itemListElement.name: Spray oil on he dough, then take it out and make a somewhat smooth ball. Using some flour spread the dough on 8 or 9 inch pan with tall sides making sure to spread some of the dough above the edge. Keep the bottom thick enough else it might not support the heavy toppings. *

itemListElement.text: Layer with vegan mozzarella, pizza sauce, red bell pepper and spinach mixture, other veggies if using. olives, pizza sauce, vegan mozzarella, some fresh basil and red pepper flakes.
itemListElement.name: Layer with vegan mozzarella, pizza sauce, red bell pepper and spinach mixture, other veggies if using. olives, pizza sauce, vegan mozzarella, some fresh basil and red pepper flakes.

itemListElement.text: Bake at 435 degrees F / 225Âºc for 25 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle some more fresh basil on the pizza. Let the pizza rest for 5 to 10 minutes before slicing.
itemListElement.name: Bake at 435 degrees F / 225Âºc for 25 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle some more fresh basil on the pizza. Let the pizza rest for 5 to 10 minutes before slicing.
